title: Forbidden URL when downloading PyTorch
body_html:
🐛 Bug

Facing the error 403 forbidden URL while downloading

HTTP error 403 while getting http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl
 Could not install requirement torch==0.4.1 from http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl because of error 403 Client Error: Forbidden for url: http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl
Could not install requirement torch==0.4.1 from http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl because of HTTP error 403 Client Error: Forbidden for url: http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl for URL http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl

The Combination I was trying to download is
Stable>Windows>Pip>3.6>None

body:
## 🐛 Bug

Facing the error 403 forbidden URL while downloading

 ```
HTTP error 403 while getting http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl
  Could not install requirement torch==0.4.1 from http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl because of error 403 Client Error: Forbidden for url: http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl
Could not install requirement torch==0.4.1 from http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl because of HTTP error 403 Client Error: Forbidden for url: http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl for URL http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl
```
The Combination I was trying to download is 
Stable>Windows>Pip>3.6>None
